definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: What does Jesus Christ mean to you today?
sentences.chinese: 請反躬自問，耶穌基督在今天對你又有何意義呢？

sentences.english: I searched my heart if I had been unfair in criticizing John only.
sentences.chinese: 我反躬自問，只批評約翰一個人是否有失公平。
